item.title: Want to Boost Your Intelligence? Science Says Start Taking a Multivitamin
item.description: Granted, the effect might take three years to accumulate… but the results are dramatic.

item.title: Ben Franklin Found the Secret to Happy Aging 275 Years Ago. Modern Psychology Agrees
item.description: Founding father Ben Franklin lived to 84, enjoying excellent mental and physical health. Ignore his approach to aging at your peril.

item.title: With Its Google Gemini Deal, Apple Just Made Its Most Intelligent Move Yet
item.description: The deal to power Siri makes sense for everyone involved, even if it goes against Apple’s usual playbook.

item.title: Investors Make a Bold Move to Rescue Troubled Whiskey Brand Uncle Nearest as Owners Fight for Control
item.description: The owners don’t want to sell, but a $108 million loan is looming.

item.title: AI Holograms Are Here. What Does This Mean for AI Companions?
item.description: It’s not a bad idea, in theory. Giving AI a face is not just a marketing ploy but a biological inevitability.
